string.value: Otona ni natta bakari no seinen wa, fuyukaina odoroki o takusan ajiwau koto ni naru.
Kodokuna ryokoo-sha o koogeki suru tame ni kono keiryoo sharyoo o shiyoo suru no wa, shoshinsha matawa zetsuboo-tekina sanzoku dakedesu.
Raku ni okane o kasegu aikoo-ka no niizu ni awa sete kaizoo sa reta reeshingukaa.
Jooyoosha yori mo wazuka ni pawaa to sookoo ga sugurete imasuga, soredemo ichitaiichi no sentoo de shinkokuna kyooi to naruniha juubunde wa arimasen.
Sanzoku ga shuudan de atsumatte kuru to, mottomo juu busoo shita torakku demo kusen shimasu.
Tokojirami no koya.
Gokiburi no koya.
Ari no koya.
Gurasuhoppaa no kyabin.
Risa no koya. Tsuujoo no teisatsu-ki kara kaizoo sa reta kyabinmoderu.

Juu wa yowaku, supiido wa ryookoo. Kono kuruma ni tsuite wa hoka ni iu koto wa arimasenga, kashoo hyooka shinaide kudasai. Pirania no yoo ni, korera no chiisana kuruma wa emono ni mukatte kyuukooka shimasu. ooku no baai, kore ga fuun'na doraibaa ga jinsei de saigo ni miru monodesu.
Kono mezurashii gaikan no moderu wa, sore jitai de kyooi to naru no ni juubun'na buki o toosai shite imasu. Soshite, sanzoku ga tandoku de koogeki suru koto wa hotondo nai koto o kangaeru to...
Sookoo ga ari, kanari hayai kuruma. Rokettoranchaa ni yoru kaizoo wa tokuni kikendesu.

Gun'yoo torakutaa wa toozoku no niizu ni awa sete tsukura rete ori, sugureta unpan nooryoku to sookoo no yobi o sonaete imasu. Kore ni yori, oogata sharyoo o teishi sa seru tame no shooheki to shite shiyoo dekimasu. 2-Tsu no kyodaina juu ga anchisukiru ni kantan ni taisho shimasu.
Sono sookoo wa sensha ni hitteki suru monodearu tame, sanzoku wa kono monsutaa o hijoo ni aishiteimasu. Jimoto no genjuumin ni rakuda o omoidasa seru tame, tokuni sabaku de yoku shiyoo sa remasu.

Sensha wa, saigai-go no sekai de sooguu suru mottomo kiken'na teki no 1-tsudesu. Daremoga aete kare to tatakai o idomu wakede wanaishi, mochiron daremoga ikite tatakai kara seikan dekiru wakede wanai.
Kanoonakagiri mottomo kuuruna berazu.
Muteki no piisumeekaa, sharyoo sonshoo no atarashii moderu o demonsutoreeshon shimasu.

Kono torakku no kyooi-tekina sekisai nooryoku wa densetsu-tekidesu. Wazuka suu-kai no hikoo de kore o riyoo shite taikin o teniireta inochishirazu no hito mo imasu. Shikashi, kyooryokuna yoroi nimokakawarazu, nimotsu o haitatsu dekinakatta hito wa sarani takusan imasu.
Seikoo suru hito wa, sekisai-ryoo to busoo no baransu ga sugurete iru tame, Uraru o sentaku shimasu. Saisoku no oogata torakku ga don'na juutai kara mo nukedashimasu.

Kono yoona kikai de kookai suru kikenwookasu no wa, mottomo fuchuuina, matawa hisshi no toreedaa dakedesu. Wazuka 1-tsu no yowai taihoo to hobo kanzen'na sookoo no ketsujo wa, takai kidoo-sei ni yotte bubun-teki ni shika oginawa remasen.
Kosutopafoomansu ni sugure, goonoo ya ken'yaku shoonin ni aisa reru kei torakku. Shikashi, senmonka wa kono anzen-sei ga fujuubun'na moderu o konomimasen.

Koogeki wa saidai no boogyodesu. Heiwa shugi-sha hodo ooku no buki o toosai shita sharyoo wa hoka ni arimasen. Kore o okonau ni wa, shuuyoo-ryoku o gisei ni suru hitsuyoo ga arimashitaga, kekka wa soredake no kachi ga arimasu.

"Sato" shisutemu wa, hijoo ni shinrai-sei no takai nenryoo ponpu o sonaeta tsuika tankudesu. | Kenkoo +125 | Nenryoo tanku yooseki +75%
Jagaimo wa sooiu monoda. Koko ni nani o tsuika dekimasu ka? Subete no hitobito no omona shokuryoo-gen.
Baainiyotte wa, zangai kara torakku no yoi buhin o tsukuru koto ga dekimasu. Mata, darekaga sabita kinzoku o tokashite ingotto o tsukuru hoohoo o mananda tomo iwa rete imasu.
Mokuzai wa tsuneni netsugendeshita. Nenryoo to shite mo, ankana kenchiku zairyoo to shite mo.
Sekiyu o seisuru mono wa kaiun o seisuru. Shitagatte, kono kichoona seihin ni wa inboo ga orikoma rete iru koto ga yoku arimasu.
Seibi-shi ni totte kaka senai kikoo no kookan buhin.
Irotoridori no garasu de tsukura reta sooshoku wa kooun o motarashi, okane o yobikomimasu. Zentai ga ookii hodo kachi ga takaku narimasu.
Koo okutanka nenryoo wa hijoo ni kishoodeari, kanari no kosuto ga kakarimasu.
Risaikuru sa reta mokuzai de tsukura reta ie wa, doro koya ya koya yori mo tsuyokute attakaidesu.
Mainaa wa, doosa shite iru yoo ni mieru yunitto zentai o hakken dekiru baai ga arimasu. Tekisetsuna sukiru ga areba, sorera kara makotoni kachinoaru soobi o sakusei dekimasu.
Korera no kusai boo ga kako ni dono yoo ni tsukawa rete ita ka wa fumeidesuga, genzaide wa pooshon no zairyoo to shite sekkyokutekini shiyoo sa rete imasu.
Furui hon. Kyoo, moji o yomeru hito wa hotondo imasenga, yomeru hito wa, kibanda shiitsu no naka ni kakusa reta nanseiki ni mo wataru chie no tame ni, yorokonde taikin o haraimasu.
Mottomo senshin-tekina moderu no kiki ni wa, usui haiteku juuten ga hitsuyoodesu. Denshi kiki no taiseki-mono ga kokatsu shitara doo naru ka o kangaeru no wa osoroshiidesu.
5.56 kookei no ta hooshin kikan juu ga teki ni namari no umi o okurikomimasu. Shin no kyooryokuna handoo wa kogatasha sae ooten sa seru kanoosei ga arimasu.
5.45 kookei no kikan juu wa, osoraku torakku ni soobi dekiru jidoo shoojuu no naka de mottomo yowai monodesu.
5.45 kookei doojiku kikan juu. 2-Tsu no hooshin to mijikai riroodo jikan ni yori, hobo renzoku shageki ga kanoodesu.
7.62 kookei no kikan juu - kore ga areba, mijikai ryokoo ni dekakeru koto o moo osoreru koto wa arimasen.
12.7 kookei no kikan juu wa, toozoku to tatakau no ni fusawashii bukidesu.
Shoshinsha no ryokoo-sha ni wa ko kookei no juu ga tekishite imasu.
Chiisana Chikara nimokakawarazu, chiisana parusureezaa wa hotondo subete no sookoo o yaki tsukushimasu.
23 mm chookyori-hoo wa, tekisetsuna shiyoosha ni totte kyooryokuna bukidesu.
Shottogan wa shikin kyori de ookina dameeji o ataemasu.
Kono buki kara okura reru purazumachaaji wa teisoku de hikoo shimasuga, meichuu sureba mojidoori teki o yaki tsukusu koto ga dekimasu.
14.5 kookei no kikan juu wa honmono no kaibutsu de, usui sookoo o kami no yoo ni kirisakimasu.
20 mm kookei no rensha-hoo wa, nihon'ashi no doobutsu o karu no ni saitekidesu.
23 mm sokusha-hoo wa teikuu hikoo no kookuuki o koogeki suru no ni tekishite imasu. Gendai sekaide wa sorera ga kanzen ni sonzai shinai tame, chijoo yooto ni ten'yoo sa remashita.
37 mm chookyori-hoo wa, chookyori no teki o hakai suru kyooryokuna shudandesu.
Toozoku-dan to notatakai de seijitsuna shoonin ga hitsuyoo to suru no wa, koodaina eria o koosoku de koogeki suru kotodesu.
Hijoo ni matomona purazumaranchaa. Izure ni seyo, taisen aite wa dare mo monku o iimasendeshita.
Omoi shottogan wa, teki ga anata no sharyoo ni chikadzukanai yoo ni suru tame no settoku-ryoku no aru girondesu.
Kono rokettoranchaa wa shooryoo no Soo kusuri de roketto o hassha shimasuga, tairyoo no roketto o hassha shimasu.
Kono rokettoranchaa o shiyoo suru to, 1-kai no seisha de fukusuu no teki o doojini koogeki dekimasu.
Sono na no toori, kono yunitto wa senjoo de hontoo no kasai arashi o hikiokosu kanoosei ga arimasu.
Kyokutan'na jookyoo de sharyoo no shuui no teki o ayamatte koogeki suru baai ni shiyoo shimasu. Chijoo no taagetto ni taishite nomi kinoo shimasu.
Sentoo ni okeru saigo no giron. Ichigeki de chuugata torakku ga jooki ni kawaru hododa.
Kono buki o shiyoo suru to, teki wa yookooro o tsukawazu ni kuruma o tokasu koto ga dekimasu.
Teki ga sukirude wanaku suu de anata o tsurete ikou to shite iru baai, kono juu wa masani sono yoona baai ni saitekidesu.
Kono rokettoranchaa no koogeki wa teki ni suki o ataemasen. Tatoe o sooshikideatte mo.

Korera no misairu wa, koosoku katsu kooritsu-teki to iu 2-tsu no kotoba ni yotte tokuchoodzuke raremasu. Soshite, teki wa, karera ni deatta nochi, shizuka de shinda to iu kotoba ni yotte tokuchoodzuke raremasu.
Tankyori-nai no subete no teki sharyoo ni kaminari ga ochimasu.
Torakku no sayuu ni aru subete no sharyoo ni bakuhatsu-tekina bakuyaku o issei shageki shite koogeki shimasu.
Pureiyaa no kuruma wa 5-byookan 1.5-Bai ni kasoku shimasu.
Kono tsuuru wa, teki ni shibarakunoaida, sentoo kara sharyoo no seigyo ni chuui o kirikaeru yoo ni kyoosei shimasu.

Kono chiryoo-hoo wa, aite no taiya o torinozoku no ni yakudachi, anata mo aite o torinozoku koto ga dekimasu. Taiya no panku wa, sukunakutomo suu-byookan wa teki o ugokenaku suru kakujitsuna hoohoodesu.
Hiroi han'i de teki o koogeki shimasu. Zan'nen'nagara, watashitachi ga nozomu hodode wa arimasen.
Kassei busshitsu no kyookyuu-ryoo no zooka to keeshingu no kairyoo ni yori, kono kirai-soo no hoodan wa hontooni kiken'na mono ni natte imasu.
Naizoo sensaa to bakuhatsu seigyo shisutemu ni yori, kono jirai wa koogeki ni saitekina jikan to basho o sentaku shi, teki ni saidai no dameeji o ataeru koto ga dekimasu.
Ban no mottomo shinpuruna kyabin.
Sukoshi kaizoo sa reta ban no kyabin.
oohaba ni kaizoo sa reta ban no kyabin.
Mirukutankaa no tsuujoo no kyakushitsu. Fuman mo buki no oki basho mo arimasen.
Hyoojun kyabu o sukoshi kairyoo shita moderudesu.
Buki ya osoroshii supaiku o shuunoo dekiru supeesu o sonaeta sai sekkei sa reta kokkupitto moderu.
Urarukyabin no shoki moderu.
Kairyoo sa reta urarukyabin.
Sentoo ni sonaeta kyabin. Yoroi o kairyoo shimashita. Buki-yoo no surotto ga 2-tsu arimasu.
Kaigai no torakku kara insupireeshon o ete sai sekkei sa reta urarukyabu.
Kono kyabin ni wa mottomo ooku no shuusei ga fukuma rete imasu. Yoroi, buki, chikara, supiido.
Berazu ni totte mottomo ankade shinpuruna kyabin. Kogata taihoo to ikutsu ka no sharyoo kairyoo soochi o setchi dekimasu.
Sudeni berazu o shutoku shite ite toreedo ni kyoomigaaru hito ni totte wa yoi sentakudesu.
Toreedaa ni totte risoo-tekina sentakushidesu.
Kono kyabin wa, enjin shutsuryoku dakedenaku yusoo-ji no anzen-sei ni mo hairyo suru toreedaa-muke ni sekkei sa rete imasu.
Sugureta sookoo seinoo to sugureta karyoku o kanesonaeta kyabin.
Piisumeekaakyabin no beeshikkumoderu. Mottomo shinpuruna kyabindeatte mo, sugureta sookoo-sei to sentoo-sei o sonaete imasu.
Beesumoderu no shuusei. Kihon parameeta o kaizen shimashita.
Kono kyabin no kaizoode wa 2-tsu no oogata-hoo o soobi suru koto ga dekimasu.
Saranaru supiido, sookoo, pawaa.
Piisumeekaa ni saitekina kyabinmoderu. Kono tekunorojii no kiseki ni kyodaina taihoo o setchi dekireba, teki wa shi o matsu ka nigeru shika arimasen.
Ban to shite wa saishoo katsu shinpuruna bodi.
Beesumoderu ni kurabete kashitsu supeesu ga jakkan kakudai. Tokushu buki o shuunoo dekiru supeesu mo arimasu.
Bodi ni wa shoshinsha no toreedaa-muke no sekisai nooryoku ga ari, shoshinsha-muke no inochishirazu no yoroi mo sonawatte imasu.
Ookina karada to buki no tame no supeesu wa, mottomo tanjun'na kaizoo ni wa waruku arimasen.
Kiso bodi o sukoshi kairyoo shimashita. Yori ooku no sookoo to tokubetsuna buki no tame no supeesu.
Miruku torakku ni saitekina bodi wa, omoi yoroi to ookina juu o toosai dekiru supeesudesu.
Torihiki ni juubun'na hiro-sa, sentoo ni juubun'na taikyuu-sei.
Kono bodi ni wa, tokubetsuna buki dakedenaku, mottomo kyooryokuna teki ni taishite shinken'na giron to naru saidokyanon mo toritsukeru koto ga dekimasu.

Kono shatai moderu wa booeki-yoo to iu yori mo sentoo-yoo ni sekkei sa rete ori, kyodaina taihoo o toritsukeru koto ga dekiru tame, mottomo kookana moderu o koonyuu suru no ni juubun'na shikin o mada motteinai shageki aikoo-ka ni totte sugureta soryuushon to natte imasu.
Kono kitai wa karyoku wa hikuiga sookoo ga atsui.
Uraru-yoo bodi no sai jooi moderudesu. Sono chokusetsu no mokuteki wa sentoodesu. Sugureta karyoku to nankoofuraku no yoroi.
Mitame wa taru no yoona bodidesuga, yooryoo wa shikkari arimasu.
Torihiki ni tazusawaru hitobito-muke ni sekkei sa rete imasu. Kono bodi o koonyuu suru koto wa, torakkudoraibaa no yume o jitsugen suru tame no daiippodesu.
Hirui no nai shatai no hiro-sa ni kuwaete, ryakudatsu-sha to no sentoo ni hijoo ni tekishite imasu.
Sentoo ni saiteki - kyodaina taihoo to toppa fukanoona yoroi.
Kooeki ya sentoo ni wa hotondo shin'nyuu de ?? kinai karada. Ikanaru sanzoku no yookyuu ni mo taemasu.
Hyoojun-tekina piisumeekaabodi. Takusan no sookoo, kamotsu no tame no juubun'na supeesu, sugureta juu no tame no supeesu.
Sarani yoroi ga fueta. Kyodaina taihoo ya tokushu buki o toosai suru supeesu mo arimasu.
Kono karada ni kore hodo ooku no buki o toosai dekiru node, hotondo no teki wa anata ni te o dasu koto o nozomanaideshou.
Teki no guntai zentai to tatakaunoni hobo kanpekidesu.
Gunji gijutsu no kansei-do. Tanjun'na senshi ga yumemiru koto ga dekiru subete.
Zen chikei-gata sukauto. Mottomo kimyoona basho e no ryokoo no tame ni dezain sa rete imasu.
Zen chikei-gata sukauto no kyabin.
Hantaa no koya.
Kaizoo sa reta kariudo no koya.
Sentooki no kyabin.
Kaizoo sa reta sentooki no kokkupitto.
Kuruuzaa no kyabin.
Kairyoo sa reta jun'yookan no kyabin.
Kuruuzaa hontai.
Kaizoo sa reta jun'yookan no shatai.
Waiyaa ga tobideta kono kinzoku-hen o teniireru ni wa, kusen o shii raremashita.
Kono fukakaina aatifakuto wa Orakuru ni hijoo ni yoku au to omoimasu.
Orakuru wa seikaku ni nani o motte kuru hitsuyoo ga aru no ka ?? o shitei shite inakattanode, kono mekanizumu wa hijoo ni tekishite irudeshou.

Doruido soo wa, kono ishi ga ikyooto no atama ni hahanarudaichi no ikari o motarasu koto ga dekiru to shuchoo shite imasu. Nanika no bakuhatsu-mono no yoonanode, jumon ga hatsudoo shitara chikadzukanai hoo ga iideshou.
Kono soochi no doosa wa, Orakuru ga kioku o torimodosu no ni yakudatsu hazudesu.
Tsuika no mojuuru o setsuzoku suru to, Orakuru no kinoo ga kakuchoo sa remasu. Korera no muzukashii kotoba ga nani o imi suru to shite mo.
Bi choosei wa, memori o Orakuru ni kaesu saishuu dankaidesu. Kono debaisu wa soosa o jikkoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

"Musuko yo, anata ga kono tegami o yonde iru to iu koto wa, watashi ga modotte kite anata o sodateru koto wa dekinakatta to iu kotodesu. Piitaa ga kono shigoto de subarashii shigoto o shita koto o watashi wa shitte imasu. Totemo wakakute chikaradzuyoi anata o miru to, watashi no kokoro wa namida o nagashimasu. Anata ga seichoo suru toki ni soko ni i rarenakatta koto de jibun o semete imasu. Soshite, kore wa watashi no osoroshii batsudesu. Shikashi, soodenakereba watashiniha dekinakatta koto o shitte kudasai. Watashiniha shoogai ni wataru shigoto ga matte imasu. Jibun no keikaku o kanryoo suru koto ni yotte nomi, watashi wa ochitsuite ningen ni modotta yoo ni kanjiru koto ga dekimasu. Soodenakereba... watashiniha ikiru kachi ga nai. Kono tegami wa shazaidesu. Dekireba yurushitekudasai. Anata wa itsumo watashi no kokoronouchi ni imasu, musuko."
Watashi no saisho no dokuritsu shita booeki torihiki o kanryoo suru ni wa, kono kamotsu o tonari no toshi ni haisoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Kodai no byooin no haikyo de hakken sa reta kusuri no hako.
Suu meetoru no konkuriito o kantsuu suru hodo kyooryokuna bakuyaku.
Shuudooin de tsukura reta wain no taru.
Fukugoo gookin wa shi no sabaku o oodan dekiru soochi o tsukuru no ni hitsuyooda.
Kono osoroshii mono karada wa shuudooin ni todoke rarenakereba narimasen.
Kono osoroshii mono karada wa shuudooin ni todoke rarenakereba narimasen.
Furukute rookyuu-ka shita enjin. Soshite, dare ga sono yoona janku ni okane o harau koto ni dooi surudeshou ka?
Chishiki no aru hitonara sorenari no kingaku o shiharaudearou kodai geijutsu no kessaku.
Gyangu no bosu kara ayamatte nusuma reta mayaku no kamotsu.
Kaihoo sa reta koozan kara no sekiyu ga juuten sa reta kyanisutaa.
Usui purasuchikku no disuku. Tashika ni kono shoohin wa kachi ga arimasu ne.
Kono purasuchikku-hen ni wa, Iwan Guo no nikki e no koodo ga fukuma rete imasu. Ryoohoo no disuku o motte irunode, watashi wa tsuini kare no unmei o shiru koto ga dekimasu.
Kono dokusoo-tekina soochi wa kaijoo ryokoo to kankei ga arimasu.
Yama o nukeru ton'neru no kagi.
Misairu booei.
